title: 1144 2nd Ave, Ladysmith BC V9G 1A4, Ladysmith, BC V9G 1A4 House For Sale | RE/MAX | 950062
text: Property Description for 1144 2nd Ave, Ladysmith BC V9G 1A4 Welcome home! Here is an amazing opportunity to get into a beautiful home with LEGAL suite!! Impressive main home boasts cathedral ceilings with post and beam throughout. The main home also has three spacious bedrooms, two baths, modern kitchen, wood fireplace and a large deck for entertaining. Stunning views!! Below you will find the double car garage, common laundry AND legal one bedroom suite with wood fireplace and walkout to easy access parking! Looking for extended family or BnB or long-term rental income… the possibilities are endless! Complete with kiwi, peach, raspberry, strawberry and raised garden beds in a partially fenced yard. This private oasis has been meticulously landscaped, includes sandbox, swings and garden shed. Long list of recent upgrades in this lovingly maintained, quality home. Walking distance to Main Street, Community Centre and Schools in charming Ladysmith. Huge, private lot in town, a rare gem! Please verify measurements if important. Tour this home Property Details Property Tax: $5,120 (2023) Last Updated: Thu, December 28, 2023 MLS® #: 950062 Date Listed: Dec 28, 2023 Home Features Property Type: Single Family Square Footage: 1,921 SQFT Interior Features Heating: Forced Air, Heat Pump Fireplace: Yes Basement: Finished, Full, Walk-Out Access Flooring: Carpet, Laminate, Mixed Exterior Features Acreage: 0 Roof: Asphalt Torch On Utilities Sewer: Sewer Connected Other Parking Features: Additional Parking, Attached, Driveway Fireplace Features: Insert Exterior Features: Balcony/Deck, Fenced, Garden, Playground Mortgage Calculator Similar Listings in Ladysmith MLS® property information is provided under copyright© by the Vancouver Island Real Estate Board and Victoria Real Estate Board.
